name: Eggomaniac
description:
As Elmer G. Gunn, the most important egg to ever exist, you must mediate peace between two warring space chicken factions by zooping them. Will you succeed, or will the sins of your past drag you down into egg hell?

Music from:

Flintstones (NES)

Final Fantasy Mystic Quest (SNES)

Super Mario World (SNES)


Any relation to any other type of "zooping" is purely coincidental.
